title: Synergistic force of green-synthesized zero-valent iron nanocomposites combined with different fertilizers for inhibiting cadmium accumulation in wheat
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00827H, Paper
Lei Peng, Nan Xu, Yinglin Liu, Yifei Feng, Jilong Xiong, Xuelian Wang, Wenxin Jiang, Jin Jin
The essential nutrients for healthy crop growth may affect the nanotechnology-based remediation of agricultural soils contaminated with cadmium (Cd). However, this hypothesis has not been thoroughly explored. This study investigated...
